loginInformation: Please sign in with the registered account
loginOtpInformation: If you have an account with registered phone number, sign in with your phone number.
loginPhoneEmailInformation: If you have an account, sign in with your email address or phone number.
registerInformation: If you represent a company, it is recommended that you use our company account area. By creating a company account, access to B2B features such as quotes, company user management, instant ordering, and more can be made available to all company members.
The account sign-in was incorrect or you: Akun anda salah atau akun Anda dinonaktifkan untuk sementara. Harap tunggu dan coba lagi nanti.
